name: namespace
description: Namespace of the pod to which filter need to be applied

name: label-selector
description: When pod_name is not specified, pod matching the label will be selected for the chaos scenario

name: exclude-label
description: Label for excluding one or more pods from chaos

name: pod-name
description: When label_selector is not specified, pod matching the name will be selected for the chaos scenario

name: instance-count
description: Targeted instance count matching the label selector

name: traffic-type
description: List of directions to apply filters - egress/ingress ( needs to be a list )
validation_message: List of directions can be [ingress], [egress] or both of them [ingress,egress]

name: ingress-ports
description: Ingress ports to block ( needs to be a list )
validation_message: Ingress ports can be a list of port numbers comma separated on square brackets eg. [22,80] or an empty list []

name: egress-ports
description: Egress ports to block ( needs to be a list )
validation_message: Egress ports can be a list of port numbers comma separated on square brackets eg. [22,80] or an empty list []

name: wait-duration
description: Ensure that it is at least about twice of test_duration
